Package jcolibri.extensions.textual.wordnet

WordNetBridge extension.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JColibriPrincetonObjectDictionaryFile ObjectDictionaryFile that accesses files names with the Princeton dictionary file naming convention.
WordNetBridge WordNet wrapper that loads the dictionary into memory without having to install it in the file system.
 

Enum Summary
WordNetBridge.POS Part-Of-Speech tags
